post: MVC architecture separates data (Model), user interface (View), and business logic (Controller), facilitating easier maintenance, scalability, and efficient development in software and web applications.

Authentication vs. Authorization: Explore the crucial differences between these two fundamental security processes. Authentication verifies a user's identity, ensuring they are who they claim to be, typically through passwords or biometric data. In contrast, Authorization determines the user's access rights and privileges within a system after their identity is authenticated. Understanding this distinction is key to implementing robust security protocols in any digital environment.
